results.title: Achievement in Hong Kong
results.brief_description: The life of the Chinese population of Hong Kong and the emergency housing scheme. The history of the colony; the Chinese tradition; the disastrous fire of Christmas 1953 and the subsequent establishment of the Government Resettlement Department. Progress on the rehousing scheme, building large concrete blocks of emergency dwellings, to be converted into permanent flats as conditions improve. Cinematographer: Julius Evans

results.title: Achievement
results.creator_credit: Lex Halliday, Jean Halliday, Crusader Cloth Pty Ltd and Australian Instructional Films
results.brief_description: The story of the Australian wool industry. The success of this industry and its importance to the Australian economy is dependent on the work of many people; the sheep breedere, the boundary rider, the wool classer, the broker, and the skilled operatives converting fibre to cloth, all play their part.

results.title: Achieve with honor
results.brief_description: Sponsored by the Helms Athletic Foundation, this film gives a history of the Olympic Games, from the first Olympiad of the modern era at Athens in 1896 until the 11th Olympiad in Berlin in 1936. Presents and reiterates the notion that winning is less important than competing well but then, however, goes on to recount a list of victorious athletes from past Olympics. Narrated by Bill Henry.

results.title: Ace Ventura: when nature calls (Captioned)
results.creator_credit: Steve Oedekerk, James G. Robinson and Morgan Creek
results.brief_description: Jim Carrey again stars as Ace Ventura, the animal sleuth with the gravity-defying hairstyle in this sequel to ‘Ace Ventura, Pet Detective’ (309280). In the deepest jungles of Africa, two tribes will fight a savage war unless their sacred animal god is found. So they’re sending for the only man who can help. Africa will never be the same again as Ace discovers the animal within and answers the call of the wild in this out-there comedy! Cast includes Jim Carrey, Ian McNeice, Simon Callow, Adewale Akinnuoye-Agbaje and Maynard Eziashi.

results.title: Ace Ventura: pet detective
results.creator_credit: Tom Shadyac, James G. Robinson and Morgan Creek
results.brief_description: There’s hope out there for all distraught pet owners concerned about the disappearance of their pets; Ace Ventura, pet detective, whose leading the small but exclusive field. Ace is contacted by the beautiful Melissa (Courteney Cox), to locate Snowflake, dolphin mascot of the Miami Football team and good luck charm. Ace is not only up against a ruthless kidnapper, but scorn and resistance from the police force who have the utmost contempt for his profession. Cast includes Jim Carrey, Sean Young, Courteney Cox, Tone Loc and Dan Marino (Miami Dolphins).

results.title: Accused
results.creator_credit: Thornton Freeland, Douglas Fairbanks, Marcel Hellman and Criterion Film Productions
results.brief_description: A British melodrama set around a Paris dance troupe and the main performers, Tony (Douglas Fairbanks Jr) and Gaby (Dolores Del Rio) Seymour. When dancer Yvette Delange (Florence Desmond) begins to direct her attentions to the somewhat unwilling Tony, a quarrel ensues between Yvette and Gaby. The sudden death by stabbing of Yvette causes suspicion to fall on Gaby and it is only when the trial takes place, the true identity of the murderer is unmasked. Cast also includes Basil Sydney, Googie Withers, Cecil Humphreys.

results.title: Accounting equation. Parts 1-4
results.creator_credit: Niels Ellmoos, Bill Renwick and Interaction Media
results.brief_description: A four part instructional series following a ‘real-life’ business entity in Newcastle, Australia, through one month’s trading, to the presentation of financial statements.
